title: Mediterranean baked fish
ingredients: ['5 plum tomatoes', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1/2 red onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 pinch dried oregano', '4 tablespoons white wine', '24 Kalamata olives, pitted and chopped', '4 tablespoons capers', '1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice', '6 leaves fresh basil, chopped', '3 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '500g (1 1/4 lb) flounder or sole fillets', '6 leaves fresh basil, torn']
